content.description: Many works of literature feature a character who is sick or dying. That character’s illness or mortality can affect other characters and may serve as a symbol for a larger idea. Either from your own reading or from the list to the left, choose a work of fiction in which a character is sick or dying. Then, in a well-written essay, analyze how the symbolism of the character’s illness or mortality contributes to an interpretation of the work as a whole. Do not merely summarize the plot. In your response you should do the following: Respond to the prompt with a thesis that presents an interpretation and may establish a line of reasoning. Select and use evidence to develop and support your line of reasoning. Explain the relationship between the evidence and your thesis.
